name: Solar System (itch) (Ng Kai Yan)
description:
This is my solar system project for the Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 Course by Michigan State University on Coursera. I have added the following elements in the solar system:

  • Sun
  • Mercury
  • Venus 
  • Earth
  • Moon
  • Mars
  • Phobos
  • Deimos
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus
  • Neptune
  • Comet

Credits

Created by Ng Kai Yan
